name: The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff
description:
Perhaps your Sim has been stuck in the suburban rut for too long. An elegant gown and a terribly overpriced fur coat can go a long way to remedy the doldrums of the quiet life. Your Sims can collect modern art and throw elegant parties with gowns and tails, or fill their living room with sectional sofas and enormous stereo systems that test the insulation. Champagne wishes and caviar dreams are no longer beyond their reach. The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff brings it all to your PC, using the same intuitive control system that has made The Sims line one of the easiest systems to learn in all of gaming.

Have the best dressed Sims and throw the coolest parties. Watch your reputation grow and turn your Sims world into your own edition of Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous. With The Sims 2: Glamour Life Stuff, you get to live the life of a celebrity from the comfort of your own home.
